document_data.name: Undertakers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Undertakers''' were a bandit group based out of the [[Dungeon Level]] of [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Undertakers were a group of failed actors and singers that posed as [[vampire]]s and extorted tolls from gullible adventurers. They were at war with the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]].
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} the relationship between the gang's two leaders, [[Harria Valashtar]] and [[Uktarl Krannoc]], had broken and the two started plotting to kill each other and become the only leader of the gang.
